API Status#

This page highlights the different endpoints that are available to the web interface to interact with the status of the web API.

Usage#

GET /api/v1#

An endpoint that checks the status of the v1 segment of the API service.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – When the status of API v1 is verified to be enabled.

Example request:

GET /api/v1 HTTP/1.1

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "status": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {}
}
GET /api/v1/status#

An endpoint that checks the status of the database connection in the server.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – When the status of the database connection is retrieved.

Example request:

GET /api/v1/status HTTP/1.1

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "status": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {
      "status": "online"
  }
}

Implementation Documentation#

class server.web_api.routing.v1.core_routing.CoreRouter#

Bases: object

main_api()#

An endpoint that checks the status of the v1 segment of the API service.

Returns

A response model containing the online status of the v1 segment of the API service.

Return type

server.web_api.models.ResponseModel

status()#

An endpoint that checks the status of the database connection in the server.

Returns

A response model containing the online status of the database connection.

Return type

server.web_api.models.ResponseModel
